# device

**Instance Property**

The Metal device object that created the library.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

You can only use the library with this [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice].

## Identifying the library

- **label**: A string that identifies the library.
